author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update `customisePixelL1ClusterThresholdForRun2Input()` to adjust also the GPU producer with the Run 2 settings.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### PR backport status:

Backport of #35901 to 12.1.x .
title: Update customisePixelL1ClusterThresholdForRun2Input to adjust also the GPU producer [12.1.x]
